body:
Hey everyone, I was thinking what the Avicus community eats for breakfast and what they prefer.

I myself like to have waffles with butter, but sometimes I like to have toast with peanut butter.

Comment below what you like to eat for breakfast

NOTE : People that drink Dylans milk in a box thing and people that eat toast with jam are NOT allowed to post.

replies.body:
I like to eat diversely... so
  • Brown Sugar Oat Cereal (trust me, it's good..)
  • Bowl of Rice/Soup
  • Toast (eggs are optional)
Usually eaten with water or milk lol
Most common breakfast items for me. These are the only ones I can think of off the top of my head.

Breakfast is actually the most important meal you have In a day, without it, you aren't as healthy as you can be.
